content:
My currently new to FHIR, what to understand more on it
How different is it from HL7, x12

Does FHIR provide edi format in a api format to be exposed as rest ?

Please do share any documentation/link to go through

Thanks a lot and much appreciated
Try reading the summaries on the front page of the spec

..or one of these introductory videos (about 30 minutes each):
• FHIR for Executives (TED-like talk), https://vimeo.com/112905640
• Introduction to FHIR (general IT audience), https://vimeo.com/191770214
